author: Deb
title: Activities To Celebrate BPS 136th Anniversary
text:
October 1, 2015 | 0 Comments 
Today [Oct 1] marks the 136th anniversary of the Bermuda Police Service which was established on October 1st 1879, and to celebrate the Bermuda Police Service will host a week of events. 
A police spokesperson said, “Our Special Week will start on Sunday October 4th and Finish Saturday October 11th. The theme for this year is “Serving our community together”. 
“We are encouraging the public to join us and our community partners in celebrating 136 years of Service To Bermuda.” Related Stories
